mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE_PLANMAKER ( COURSE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{regDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COURSE_ID AS courseId, FILE_NAME AS fileName, FILE_PATH AS filePath, REG_DATE AS regDate FROM LECTURE_PLANMAKER ORDER BY REG_DATE ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
